description: Spotify and two unions, the Ringer Union and the Gimlet Union, agreed on a 3-year union contract, the first in the tech industry. The contract sets salary minimums, annual salary increases, terms for severance pay, and diversity hiring guarantees but does not clarify terms around intellectual property.
author: hyatt d.
